mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", ORIGIN_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", BOARD_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
